Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format

Class MetapathFormatter

java.lang.Object
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format.MetapathFormatter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPathFormatter
public class MetapathFormatter extends Object implements IPathFormatter
An IPathFormatter that produces a Metapath expression for the path to a given INodeItem.
